name: CwlUtils
summary: A collection of Swift utilities as documented on cocoawithlove.com
description: Stack traces, system information with sysctl, presentation of unanticipated errors, random number generators, mutexes, dispatch timers, a Result type, copy-on-write double-ended queue, function execution contexts, testing actions over time. See [Cocoa with Love](https://cocoawithlove.com) for more.
